summary: I liked the look of the Mystic Tuning Gloves used in the "Out of Balance" quest at the College of Winterhold. So I took the model and duplicated it, making minor tweaks in various things. One example is marking them as clothing gloves, enabling them to count for Frostfall's body coverage.
descriptionHtml:
I liked the look of the Mystic Tuning Gloves used in the "Out of Balance" quest at the College of Winterhold, and was disappointed that I couldn't keep them.

I took the model and duplicated it, making minor tweaks in various things. One example is marking them as clothing gloves, enabling them to count for Frostfall's body coverage.

You can craft them at the Forge (under the Misc category) after you've completed the quest. (PLEASE tell me if it doesn't work for some reason. I have no idea if the recipe will vanish after completing it a few times.)

To craft them you'll need:
- 1 linen wrap
- 1 silver ingot
- 1 leather strip

Very simple mod, separate files, no conflicts should occur. Any texture replacers will also effect these.
author: Himeki
